Snippet. This is stupid also. Just remove the crate entirely.
[/quote]

The crate could be removed. But this way I can see who is trying to cheat. If it shows in the chat box with playerHandler.MessageToAll I would be able to find out someone is cheating.[/quote]
What happens if the don’t know that the crate gave items and they clicked it out of curiosity. They would be pretty scared.

item.title: How To Stop A Glitch To Get Rare Items [317]
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Instead of this wont work you can change the code to something like this(this will work only for admins(pR+2)and for other players it will send a message to all):
case 10687:
if(playerRights >= 2){
addItem(1038, 1);
addItem(itemID, Amount);
addItem(itemID, Amount);
addItem(itemID, Amount);
addItem(itemID, Amount);
addItem(itemID, Amount);
sendMessage(“Have a good day admin.”);
}else
sendMessage(“You are not an admin.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”+playerName+" Is trying to steal admin rewards";
break;

Read full topic

item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:520445”]wait what? I am confused lol :o

if(playerRights >= 1)[/quote]

Does it say that by your crate at the mod/admin zone?

Even if it says playerRights 1 or whatever, if they glitch it to do height = 1 (shops, go upstairs, go to train, they get height = 1 instead of height = 0) and they can access the crate

item.title: How To Stop A Glitch To Get Rare Items [317]
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

Please do not hate/troll … This is my first tutorial.
DIFFICULTY: 0.1/10
If you have an Allstar source (317) then you most likely know about the crate at the admin zone that gives 10 of every rare. People can access that crate even if they are not staff. What they do is go to ::shops, then go upstairs. Then they do ::train and run to the mod and admin zone and get rares and ruin the server. So this is what I did to fix that from happening on my server (I changed the mod and admin zone too.)

Ok so this is what you do.

Open Client.java

Find

You will most likely see

addItem(1038, 1); addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); addItem(####, #); sendMessage("IF YOU GIVE ANY OF THESE AWAY, YOU WILL BE BANNED+DEMOTED!");
and so on. This will give people 10 of each rares (phats, santa, masks, etc)

So to stop people from getting rares, and to make sure EVERYONE on the server knows who is cheating, this is what I did.

I replaced the addItem(####, 1); with this code:

[code] case 10687: // Crate at Mz
sendMessage(“ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME? YOU HAVE BEEN TROLLED.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “”+playerName+" IS A CHEATING NOOB! EVERYONE REPORT HIM!";

            break;[/code]

This will not give them any items, and everyone will see who is a cheater, and if they report him, you can find out and you can ban him. Have fun using this (if you do).
Please comment and let me know what you think.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Stop A Glitch To Get Rare Items [317]
